name: "The Freshest" CD
description:
Funktown Connection's debut album, "The Freshest" featuring ill tracks from DJ Spook and Frosty the Flowman. Each CD is labeled and pressed by Spook and Frosty themselves!

Featuring:

"Bring on the Horns"
"Calling all Hood Rats"
""Abducted by Lurch"
"Funktown Station"
"Dr. Hip Hop" ft. Spliff Side Brothers
"Tough Guy Talk"
"All Aboard" (The Hawtdawg Dance)

name: "The Freshest" on Cassette
description:
Funktown Connection's debut album, "The Freshest", is available for a limited time on a throwback cassette tape. Dust off your old walkman tape player, order a limited edition tape, and leave your worries behind. 

Featuring:
 
"Bring on the Horns"
"Calling all Hood Rats"
""Abducted by Lurch"
"Funktown Station"
"Dr. Hip Hop" ft. Spliff Side Brothers
"Tough Guy Talk"
"All Aboard" (The Hawtdawg Dance)

name: FTC Package Deal
description:
Want a button pack but don't feel like paying for shipping and handling? Maybe you want a sticker for your ride but don't feel like spending a buck or two. Well, FTC loves their listeners, so we're offering this deal to our die hard fans. $10.00 plus S&H will get you (1) limited edition "The Freshest" cassette*, (1) CD, (1) sticker, and (1) 1" FTC logo button. 

This deals to good to pass up. Show your love and click that order button below! Available while supplies last.

*Cassette tapes are out of stock at the moment. New cassettes will be in stock soon. Please select the "package deal" minus the cassette from the drop down menu if you're interested in ordering.

name: Stickers
description:
8.5" x 1.5" rectangle stickers made from vinyl, so you know they'll endure the elements. Super sticky backing, guaranteed to stick anywhere. Slap em' on a stop sign, your ride, or a big ol' booty! 

Send us FTC sticker slap photos and we will repost them on our Facebook fan page.

name: 1" Button Pack
description:
Premium quality, 1" pin-back buttons made right here in the good ol' U.S. of A. 

Each button pack contains (1) DJ Spook collectable 1" button, (1) Frosty the Flowman collectable 1" button, and (1) Funktown Connection logo collectable 1" button. Collect all 3 and be the coolest kid on the block!
